name: UICollectionViewDragDelegate
desc: The interface for initiating drags from a collection view.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, itemsForBeginning: UIDragSession, at: IndexPath) -> [UIDragItem]
items.desc: Provides the initial set of items (if any) to drag.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, itemsForAddingTo: UIDragSession, at: IndexPath, point: CGPoint) -> [UIDragItem]
items.desc: Adds the specified items to an existing drag session.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, dragSessionWillBegin: UIDragSession)
items.desc: Notifies you that a drag session is about to begin for the collection view.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, dragSessionDidEnd: UIDragSession)
items.desc: Notifies you that a drag session ended for the collection view.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, dragPreviewParametersForItemAt: IndexPath) -> UIDragPreviewParameters?
items.desc: Returns custom information about how to display the item at the specified location during the drag.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, dragSessionAllowsMoveOperation: UIDragSession) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that determines whether a move operation is allowed for a drag session.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, dragSessionIsRestrictedToDraggingApplication: UIDragSession) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that determines whether the source app and destination app must be the same for a drag session.
